resources.string: By providing your email address, you agree to Mozilla\'s [Privacy Notice](https://www.mozilla.org/privacy/).
You can remove your email address or opt-out of any communications at any time.
Email address removed, you will no longer receive communications.

To start screen recording, tap the button below. Then, open your TikTok app and record your session while you scroll the FYP. To stop recording, press the “Stop Recording” button. You’ll be asked to share more information and submit this form.
You’ve recorded a TikTok session. Fill out some information then submit the form.

"TT Reporter" serves as a vital tool in an ongoing sociological study, seeking to understand the broader implications of content shared on TikTok. By reporting harmful videos, users contribute to a wealth of data that will be instrumental in identifying and addressing the social issues, influences, and trends within the platform.

Join us in shaping the future of digital interaction by participating in this sociological study through “TT Reporter”. Your reports make a difference in the quest to foster a safer, more informed, and socially conscious digital environment.

Anonymous Reporting: SocialSafeguard ensures users can report troubling TikTok content discreetly, preserving their privacy.

Categorization: Users can categorize the type of harm observed in videos, such as bullying, misinformation, hate speech, or other sociological factors.

Commentary: The app allows users to provide context and insights, fostering a deeper understanding of the content’s impact.

Data Collection: Reports are collated into a comprehensive database, allowing sociologists to analyze and identify trends and patterns.
Select a study to participate in
We may choose to run a few different studies simultaneously. These are the studies available to you based on location information from your IP address.
Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using TT Reporter
Are you sure you want to enroll in another study?
Are you sure you want to delete all your data from the system?
The study you were participating into has ended. Please select another study to join.
Are you sure you want to cancel the report? All the data entered will be deleted.
Enable notifications to record your TikTok session. Please grant permission in your device settings.
Enable write external storage permission to record your TikTok session. Please grant permission in your device settings.
Enable record audio permission to record your TikTok session. Please grant permission in your device settings.
The system doesn\'t seem to respond. Our cat must have been chewing the wires again.\n\nPlease forgive Tom and try again later.
The system doesn\'t seem to respond. This might happen because you have not completed the onboarding.\n\nPlease reopen the app, check the policy, select a study and try again.
We are sorry to announce that there are no studies available for your location.\n\nCome back at a later date to check if any new study has been opened.
Create a recording in order to submit the report.
Request received! An email containing your data will be sent.
